1.project_desc: My newest work in progress! I have never loved the user exprience I get when going to pay off my student loans. This project is essentially a re-skin of my current loan provider for my student loans.

2.project_desc: What is so unique about this portfolio site? It is a pixel-perfect implementation of TailwindCSS's 'Spotlight' template, but completely converted by hand into Vue (from React)

3.project_desc: Get paid for your review content, and shop online reviews hassle-free. (Only the Figma prototype can be viewed at this time)

4.project_desc: A simple Vue3 project that consumes the PokeDex API, giving you a sleek UI to see the wonderful world of Pokemon. (In progress)

5.project_desc: The all-in-one platform for collecting and managing video reviews for small to large businesses. (Only the Figma prototype can be viewed at this time)
